document_data.mainbody: elmuth "the Bastard" was the 35th Obarskyr monarch and a king of Cormyr. He took the throne after his half-nephew Baerildo Obarskyr, who was only an infant, was slain by Gorauna. Belmuths reign likewise ended because of his death in Goraunas Purplethroat Plague, and his son Sargrannon succeeded him.
